description:
After stopping for lunch at the café where Kikuchi works, the gang chats about love and dating while she tries to listen in--and stay out of sight.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Ending Ato no Heroine no Ishou wa Fudan to Chotto Chigattari Suru
Post-Game Equipment for Girls Is a Little Different Than Usual
エンディング後のヒロインの衣装は普段とちょっと違ったりする
